task.summary: Default task

Switch from .NET Core to Rust with Actix-web
Replaced the existing .NET Core project with a Rust-based Actix-web project. Deleted .NET configuration and controller files, and added initial Actix-web server setup. Updated the `.gitignore` and included the new `Cargo.lock` file.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
This commit includes new `.idea` directory files to accommodate the IntelliJ IDEA project setup. These files define project structure, VCS mappings, auto-import settings, and specific toolchain configurations for the Rust-based project.

Add 'years-end-inventory' table
Created 'years-end-inventory' table to store inventory details including tag number, store, department, percentage, prices, quantity, description, and employee details. The table includes auto-increment for the primary key and timestamp fields for creation and updates.

Update dependencies: add chrono and urlencoding
Added `chrono` for enhanced date and time handling in serde and mysql features. Included the `urlencoding` crate to support URL encoding tasks. These additions improve functionality and maintain compatibility.

Add IntelliJ data source and code style configurations
This commit introduces new configuration files for IntelliJ IDEA, including data sources for local MySQL databases and project-specific code style settings. These configurations will help streamline database connectivity and maintain consistent coding standards across the project.

Add database configuration struct
Introduce `DatabaseConfig` and `Filemaker` structs with fields for host, user, passwords, and hash. Implemented serialization and deserialization using Serde to facilitate easy reading and writing of configuration data.

Add structs for database row and insertion handling
Introduced `DatabaseRowEntry`, `DatabaseInsertEntry`, and `DBResult` structs for managing database rows, insertion data, and paginated results, respectively. This addition will streamline data handling and serialization, facilitating smoother database operations.

Add database access module
Introduce `db_access.rs` to handle range queries and database connections for the years-end-inventory table. This includes query filtering, sorting, pagination, and connecting to the MySQL database based on the provided configuration.

Add HTTP GET and POST handlers for range and test endpoints
Implemented the `range` and `test` functions to handle GET and POST requests respectively. These handlers manage query parameters, URI decoding, and error handling, interfacing with the database to either fetch or insert data based on the request.

Add dynamic server configuration fetch
Fetch server configuration dynamically from a remote URL and pass it to the Actix web application. This includes printing the server start message and integrating `database_config` for configuration management.

Update .idea/workspace.xml tasks and settings
Updated local tasks and reformatted the workspace XML. Added messages and summaries for new tasks, adjusted components, and modified file tracking settings for improved project management.

Add DatabaseUpdateEntry struct
Introduced `DatabaseUpdateEntry` struct with serialization and deserialization capabilities. This new struct mirrors `DatabaseRowEntry` with appropriate fields defined for update operations.

Add query documentation and CRUD functionality to db_access.rs
Documented the `range` function, added CRUD operations (`insert`, `delete`, `update`) and enhanced the SQL query execution handling. This improves readability and functionality of the database access layer.

Add HTTP PATCH and DELETE endpoints
Introduced PATCH and DELETE endpoints to support updating and deleting database entries. Additionally, renamed existing POST endpoint for clarity and reformatted function call arguments for better readability.

Add 'insert' service to HttpServer
Updated the dependencies and added the 'insert' service in the actix web server setup. This allows the server to handle both 'range' and 'insert' HTTP services, bolstering its functionality.

Add update and delete services to main.rs
This commit includes the addition of update and delete services to the HTTP server configuration. These additions enhance the capability of the server by allowing it to handle more types of HTTP requests. The main.rs file has been updated to import and register these new services.

Add cc as a build dependency
This commit includes the "cc" crate as a build dependency in Cargo.toml with version "1.1.7" and enables its "parallel" feature. Corresponding entry is also added to Cargo.lock to ensure proper dependency management.

Improve error handling for database config retrieval
Replaced unwrap with proper error handling for `get_config` function to prevent panics and return better error messages. This enhances the robustness of the application startup process.

Add WSL configuration for remote builds
Added WSL - Ubuntu-22.04 as a remote target with necessary Cargo and rustc paths. Updated workspace.xml for new configurations and adjusted local task settings to support remote builds through WSL. Enhanced HTTP server with update and delete services.

Add csv dependency
Added the csv crate version 1.3.0 to Cargo.toml for CSV parsing. This change updates Cargo.lock to include the necessary dependencies for the csv crate.

Add Rust project files and update debugger configuration.
Removed outdated .NET-related path changes and added new Rust project files including Cargo.lock, Cargo.toml, and relevant source files. Updated workspace.xml to include a new breakpoint in db_access.rs and recorded a new work item.

Add export service to HTTP server configuration
Reordered imports for readability and added the new `export` service to the Actix-web application. This ensures the server handles export requests properly.

Add export endpoint to httaccess.rs
Implemented a new endpoint that allows exporting database content as a CSV file. This includes handling headers for content type and file disposition, ensuring the data is downloaded as a CSV attachment.

Add CSV export function to db_access module
Implemented an async function to export year-end inventory data to CSV format. This function retrieves data from the database, maps indexes to human-readable names, and formats timestamp fields for better readability.

Update reqwest dependency with json feature
Enhanced reqwest to include the 'json' feature in Cargo.toml. This modification allows for better JSON handling capabilities within the application. No version change was made; only the feature enhancement was applied.

Swap collation names and add charset defaults
Adjusted collation names for various character sets to correct formatting inconsistencies and added 'DefaultForCharset' attribute where missing. This ensures proper default charset handling and resolves potential mismatches in collation settings.

Add employee name mapping from API in database access
This commit enhances the `db_access.rs` module by integrating an external API call to fetch employee details. The employee ID is now mapped to the full employee name in the CSV output, improving data readability and consistency.

Add Employee struct to database_row_entry.rs
Introduced a new Employee struct with fields for employee_id, first_name, last_name, and location. This struct is also annotated with Serialize and Deserialize for JSON handling.
